sentences.en: By now this had become a major preoccupation for him.
sentences.cn: 现在这已成为他的当务之急.

sentences.en: Credit and credit cards were additionally a part of his preoccupation.
sentences.cn: 信用赊账和信用卡是额外加到他头上来的思想负担之一.

sentences.en: He always takes his preoccupation with the educational cause.
sentences.cn: 他总是一心想着教育事业.

sentences.en: His main preoccupation at that time was getting enough to eat.
sentences.cn: 他那时盘算的是如何填饱肚子.

sentences.en: If you are discomfited by this preoccupation, then you have an alcohol problem.
sentences.cn: 如果你被这种酒癖弄得狼狈不堪, 那末酒对你才真正成了问题.

sentences.en: In his preoccupation with Robyn, Crook had neglected everything.
sentences.cn: 克鲁克一心想着罗宾，忽略了其他一切事情。

sentences.en: It was hard for him to be aware of her; he kept sinking back into black preoccupation.
sentences.cn: 他很难意识到她的存在；他一直沉浸在沮丧中。

sentences.en: Karouzos's poetry shows a profound preoccupation with the Orthodox Church.
sentences.cn: 卡鲁佐斯的诗歌表明他对东正教的执着。

sentences.en: Our current preoccupation with zombies and vampires is easy to explain.
sentences.cn: 要解释我们现在对僵尸与吸血鬼的痴迷,似乎并不困难.

sentences.en: Perhaps such holographic knowledge will even become one's new ascending preoccupation.
sentences.cn: 也许这类全息知识将进而成为你的提升新职业.

sentences.en: She found his preoccupation with money irritating.
sentences.cn: 她对他一心只想着钱感到很厌烦。

sentences.en: She found his preoccupation with money irritating.
sentences.cn: 她发觉他心里只有钱,感到很生气.

sentences.en: Such an excessive preoccupation with one's health can't be normal.
sentences.cn: 如此过分的关注自己的健康是不正常的.

sentences.en: Their chief preoccupation was how to feed their families.
sentences.cn: 他们关注的首要事情是如何养家糊口.

sentences.en: This added even more machinery for the preoccupation of ballroom dance.
sentences.cn: 这甚至为交际舞增加了更多机械性.

words.tran_cn: 全神贯注的；心事重重的；被先占的
先入为主；全神贯注；极为忙碌（等于preoccupation）
抢先占有；使…全神贯注（preoccupy的过去式）
全神贯注，入神；当务之急；关注的事物；抢先占据；成见

trans.tran_cn: 全神贯注，入神，当务之急，使人全神贯注的事物，偏见，成见
trans.tran_en: when someone thinks or worries about something a lot, with the result that they do not pay attention to other things
